title: coinratinternal@gmail.com
author: coinratinternal@gmail.com
content: Hatom (HTM) is autonomous and algorithmic protocol designed to facilitate lending, borrowing, and staking of various assetsHatom (HTM) presale details : https://icogems.com/ico/HatomHatom is the inaugural liquidity protocol of Multiversx, designed to revolutionize the DeFi landscape by offering a wide array of innovative products. Our mission is to foster a robust ecosystem that attracts liquidity naturally and sustainably, reducing reliance on short-term incentives or liquidity mining. Through our pioneering approach, we aim to create a comprehensive platform that energizes the DeFi space and brings lasting value to the community.
